content:
I can provide you with some recommendations for wineries to visit in california. however, please note that these recommendations are only based on my programmed knowledge, and there may be other great wineries that are not included in this list. 

1. ridge vineyards - located in the santa cruz mountains, ridge vineyards is known for producing bold, flavorful zinfandels and cabernet sauvignons.

2. tablas creek vineyard - located in paso robles, tablas creek is known for its rhône-style blends and is a pioneer in biodynamic winemaking.

3. schramsberg vineyards - located in napa valley, schramsberg is famous for producing sparkling wines, including the blanc de blancs, which is made entirely from chardonnay grapes.

4. failla wines - located in napa valley, failla produces small-lot, handcrafted wines, including pinot noir and chardonnay.

5. bonny doon vineyard - located in santa cruz, bonny doon is known for producing unique blends using lesser-known grape varieties.

6. scribe winery - located in sonoma, scribe produces natural, unfiltered wines using minimal intervention, and its tasting room is located in a historic hacienda.

7. hirsch vineyards - located in sonoma, hirsch focuses on producing pinot noir and chardonnay from its estate vineyards on the sonoma coast.

these are just a few of the many amazing wineries in california, and i encourage you to explore further based on your personal preferences and tastes.
